text: James Andrew Spratt (19 August 1951 â€“ 4 March 2021) was a British politician and police officer from Northern Ireland. He was a member of the Democratic Unionist Party. He was an MLA for South Belfast from 2007 to 2015. Spratt was to Lynda. The couple had four children. He was a Presbyterian. He died on 4 March 2021, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Democratic Unionist Party members of the Northern Ireland Assembly Category:British police officers Category:Presbyterians
title: Jimmy Spratt
